comment:
* Callback used in {@link #installSystemUpdate} to indicate that there was an error while
     * trying to install an update.

variables.name: UPDATE_ERROR_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: Represents an unknown error while trying to install an update.

variables.name: UPDATE_ERROR_INCORRECT_OS_VERSION
variables.comment: Represents the update file being intended for different OS version.

variables.name: UPDATE_ERROR_UPDATE_FILE_INVALID
variables.comment:
* Represents the update file being wrong; e.g. payloads are mismatched, or the wrong
         * compression method is used.

variables.name: UPDATE_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND
variables.comment: Represents that the file could not be found.

variables.name: UPDATE_ERROR_BATTERY_LOW
variables.comment: Represents the battery being too low to apply an update.

methods.name: public void onInstallUpdateError(@InstallUpdateCallbackErrorConstants int errorCode, @NonNull String errorMessage)
methods.comment:
* Method invoked when there was an error while installing an update. * *

The given error message is not intended to be user-facing. It is intended to be * reported back to the IT admin to be read.

methodNames: public void onInstallUpdateError(@InstallUpdateCallbackErrorConstants int errorCode, @NonNull String errorMessage)
